title: Milagrow Aguabot Robot
description: Milagrow Aguabot Robot is a mobile phone application of connecting the MILAGROW Floor washing robot products, which supports the robotic customization products with WIFI function under the MILAGROW brand. It can not only replace the traditional remote controller , but also can present more working data that cannot be displayed by the conventional remote controller. Through the APP, the user can remotely control and reserve robots for cleaning while away from home, making you to enjoy smart life anytime, anywhere.

Through the APP, the user can remotely control and reserve robots for cleaning while away from home, making you to enjoy smart life anytime, anywhere.
